meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.11 ::date 2015-09-20T09:16:57 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The founding fathers understood that there would be inequality. # ::save-date Mon Sep 28, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_11.txt
sentence: The founding fathers understood that there would be inequality.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.12 ::date 2015-09-20T09:21:27 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt And as is often said, they weren't trying to make everyone equal. # ::save-date Mon Sep 28, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_12.txt
sentence: And as is often said, they weren't trying to make everyone equal.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.13 ::date 2015-09-20T09:25:58 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt However, they DID strive to make everyone equal under the law. # ::save-date Mon Sep 28, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_13.txt
sentence: However, they DID strive to make everyone equal under the law.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.14 ::date 2015-09-20T09:29:07 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt they also understood that equal opportunity was paramount, and, equal outcome would not and should not ever be assured. # ::save-date Mon Sep 28, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_14.txt
sentence: they also understood that equal opportunity was paramount, and, equal outcome would not and should not ever be assured.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.15 ::date 2015-09-20T09:34:23 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The purpose of this thread is two-fold. # ::save-date Fri Dec 22, 2017 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_15.txt
sentence: The purpose of this thread is two-fold.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.16 ::date 2015-09-20T09:39:45 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt First, it's to dismiss the orchestrated idea that the wealthy in this country are somehow 'victims' of class warfare when talk is floated of raising their taxes to help tackle the deficit and debt at the very same time that massive cuts are on the horizon to tackle the same deficit and debt. # ::save-date Mon Sep 28, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_16.txt
sentence: First, it's to dismiss the orchestrated idea that the wealthy in this country are somehow 'victims' of class warfare when talk is floated of raising their taxes to help tackle the deficit and debt at the very same time that massive cuts are on the horizon to tackle the same deficit and debt.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.17 ::date 2015-09-20T10:02:45 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Secondly, it's to show that the REAL class warfare that exists in this country in the criminal justice system actually works in FAVOR of the wealthy and well-connected at the expense of the poor and the middle class. # ::save-date Mon Sep 28, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_17.txt
sentence: Secondly, it's to show that the REAL class warfare that exists in this country in the criminal justice system actually works in FAVOR of the wealthy and well-connected at the expense of the poor and the middle class.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.18 ::date 2015-09-20T10:12:45 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Our country is supposed to be a nation of laws and not men, right? # ::save-date Fri Dec 11, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_18.txt
sentence: Our country is supposed to be a nation of laws and not men, right?

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.19 ::date 2015-09-20T10:17:52 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Then why is it that our political and financial elites get pardons for their crimes or their crimes aren't even investigated when a country like France doesn't have a problem putting THEIR former president on trial for corruption? # ::save-date Wed Sep 30, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_19.txt
sentence: Then why is it that our political and financial elites get pardons for their crimes or their crimes aren't even investigated when a country like France doesn't have a problem putting THEIR former president on trial for corruption?

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.20 ::date 2015-09-20T10:34:10 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt If our collective ideals are to have any real meaning at all, then we have to practice what we preach to others, and it's clear that we as a nation are not doing that. # ::save-date Wed Jan 24, 2018 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_20.txt
sentence: If our collective ideals are to have any real meaning at all, then we have to practice what we preach to others, and it's clear that we as a nation are not doing that.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.21 ::date 2015-09-20T10:44:19 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt When Ford pardoned Nixon, I think everyone believed (or at least hoped) that Nixon's pardon was a one time exception. # ::save-date Mon Sep 28, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_21.txt
sentence: When Ford pardoned Nixon, I think everyone believed (or at least hoped) that Nixon's pardon was a one time exception.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.22 ::date 2015-09-20T10:49:59 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Unfortunately, all it seemed to do is set a precedent for future pardons. # ::save-date Mon Sep 28, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_22.txt
sentence: Unfortunately, all it seemed to do is set a precedent for future pardons.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.23 ::date 2015-09-20T10:54:59 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt What is ALSO unfortunate, is that while our justice system has become ever more lenient toward the rich and powerful, it's has also become increasingly merciless to the poor and the middle class because as I noted in the OP, the US has 12.5 times as many people in prison today as we had in prison 40 years ago. # ::save-date Mon Oct 23, 2017 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_23.txt
sentence: What is ALSO unfortunate, is that while our justice system has become ever more lenient toward the rich and powerful, it's has also become increasingly merciless to the poor and the middle class because as I noted in the OP, the US has 12.5 times as many people in prison today as we had in prison 40 years ago.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.24 ::date 2015-09-20T12:05:33 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt And our population hasn't increased by over a factor of 10 in the last two generations. # ::save-date Sun Sep 20, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_24.txt
sentence: And our population hasn't increased by over a factor of 10 in the last two generations.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044.30 ::date 2015-09-20T12:41:07 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt when a person makes an issue of the earning power and riches of another, absent particular crimes used to amass such, in a society that is upwardly mobile that provides the same playing field for all, what is it then? # ::save-date Sun Sep 20, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8888447_0044_30.txt
